alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:02AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Bradford, north central Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 101 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking clusters of showers and thunderstorms near George`s Lake to southwest Clay county, or 8 to 12 miles east of Keystone Heights, moving southwest 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsley, George`s Lake, Camp Blanding and Penney Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
